title: Quality Marksman & Top Looking for OOL team
body:
IGN - Seaguii
A marksman looking for a fixed position in a stable high elo team.
I am willing to cooperate with managements and fellow players. 
Attributes -
         - Can play all champions in selected role.
         - Willing to take constructive criticism. 
         - Can attend all scrim meetings.
         - Constantly practice and am willing to learn.

Message me in game if you're interested.

replies.body: Hey mate, added you in-game to have a chat.
